rotina.prompt:
Use APENAS "C:\\Users\\JE\\vida-smart-coach" como workspace. Confirme com:
 git -C "C:\\Users\\JE\\vida-smart-coach" rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD
 if exist "C:\\Users\\JE\\vida-smart-coach\\pnpm-lock.yaml" echo LOCKFILE_OK || echo LOCKFILE_MISSING
Responda só com: BRANCH=<x> e LOCKFILE=<OK|MISSING>.
